scripts.build: rimraf dist && tsc --p tsconfig.json && rimraf dist/mailer/templates/ejs && ncp ./src/mailer/templates/ejs ./dist/mailer/templates/ejs
scripts.conf: yarn config-manager --namespace cloud --entity cognito-custom-mail-lambda --name local --mode fetch
scripts.commit: concurrently "yarn test --coverage --no-cache --silent --forceExit --detectOpenHandles --runInBand --watch=false && jest-coverage-badges --input src/tests/coverage/coverage-summary.json --output src/tests/badges" "yarn lint"
